# wideRhino

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of wideRhino is to construct a canonical variate analysis biplot using the generalised singular value decomposition for high-dimensional data. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of wideRhino from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("RaeesaGaney91/wideRhino")
```

## Example

This is a basic example:

```{r example}
library(wideRhino)
## basic example code
```
